name: Antonio Carzaniga
content: Antonio Carzaniga - Home Page Antonio Carzaniga Professor Faculty of Informatics Università della Svizzera italiana (USI) È la somma che fa il totale -Totò highlights Are you interested in pursuing a PhD, studying theoretical and experimental aspects of content-based networking? Please, consider applying to the PhD program of the Faculty of Informatics of USI, or contact me for further information. Contact Information - postal address, phone numbers, directions to the USI campus, and public key Publications - list of publications including abstracts, BibTeX references, and full text for most articles Curriculum Vitæ - brief professional biography Research - current and past research interests and activities Students - current students and student theses and dissertations Software - some software systems I authored or otherwise contributed to Service - professional activities, including events I organized or otherwise contributed to Courses - recent courses I taught or otherwise contributed to Siena - a research project about a scalable, distributed publish/subscribe service Content-Based Networking - a research project about a novel advanced network service this page is maintained by Antonio Carzaniga and was updated on December 26, 2022
